Package imagingbook.pub.geometry.line

Class HessianLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine
      • imagingbook.pub.geometry.line.HessianLine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HoughLine
    public class HessianLine
extends AlgebraicLine
    This class represents a straight line in Hessian normal form, i.e., x * cos(angle) + y * sin(angle) = radius. It is a specialization (subclass) of AlgebraicLine. Instances are immutable. TODO: This class is unfinished! Handling reference points to be added/completed!
